abstract: HSBC executives say investors are pressing the bank to move its headquarters from London, but add that reports of “imminent change” are “speculative and presumptuous.”
snippet: HSBC executives say investors are pressing the bank to move its headquarters from London, but add that reports of “imminent change” are “speculative and presumptuous.”
lead_paragraph: HSBC said on Sunday that the bank was under pressure to move its headquarters from London, but noted that reports of “imminent change” were “speculative and presumptuous.”

headline.main: HSBC Feeling Pressure to Leave London
